data.title: Mrs. Mattie Williams Roberts Obituary in Dillon at Bartell Funeral Home, LLC.
data.meta_description: Bartell Funeral Home, LLC. | Dillon, SC in Dillon respectfully announces the passing of Mrs. Mattie Williams  Roberts on December 07, 2018.
data.text:
Obituary For Mrs. Mattie Williams Roberts

Mother Mattie Williams Roberts was born on March 31, 1925 to the late Boney Williams and Lottie Manning Williams. She peacefully made her transition from labor to reward on Friday, December 7, 2018.

Mattie attended the public schools of Dillon County, South Carolina. At an early age she was converted and joined St. Stephens United Methodist church where she served until she married in 1946 and moved her membership to St. Mark Baptist Church, Dillon, South Carolina.

She was a faithful member of St. Mark Baptist Church until her health failed. Mattie sang on the Senior choir, member of the Missionary society, member of the Flower club and the Sunday School Ministry.

Mattie was preceded in death by her husband: Archie Clarence “AC” Roberts; one daughter: Charlene Roberts; her parents: Boney and Lottie Williams; two sisters: Janie Simmons and Rose Gasque; four brothers: Feldon Manning, John Henry Williams, Moses Williams and Fester Williams and a son-n-law: Larry Lane.

She leaves to cherish her loving memories ~ three daughters: Hazel Roberts (James) Moultrie of Dillon, SC, Annie Mae (Sims) Washington of Viewtown, VA, Gwendolyn Lane of Greenville, SC; two sons: John W. Roberts of Upper Marlboro, MD, Feldon (Angela) Roberts of Greenville, SC; ten grandchildren: Timothy, Douglas, Patrick, Lewis, Titus, Andrew, Adam, Michelle, Jermaine, Darnell; twenty-seven great grandchildren, four great, great grandchildren and a host of nieces, nephews, other relatives and friends.

Send flowers to the service of Mrs. Mattie Williams Roberts
